articles.description: TODAY, at noon, residents came together to stand in Victoria Square to support the #BlackLivesMatter movement.
articles.content:
TODAY, at noon, residents came together to stand in Victoria Square to support the #BlackLivesMatter movement.
The movement has gained a lot of focus recently following the death of a black man in M… [+2694 chars]
